title: Best Interests of the Child
text: Child custody decisions are made based on the best interests of the child.

title: Types of Custody
text: There are two types of custody: legal custody and physical custody.

question: Can I move with my child after a divorce?
answer: Relocating with a child after a divorce may require court approval or agreement from the other parent.
